title: Enakena Lyrics in Tamil & English Meaning | Love Insurance Kompany (LIK) | Anirudh

sections.intro: Experience the heartbreaking magic of Enakenna Yaarum Illaye, the reimagined anthem from the much-anticipated film Love Insurance Kompany (LIK). Directed by Vignesh Shivan and featuring the visual brilliance of Ravi Varman, this track brings together the iconic vocals of Anirudh Ravichander and Ananthakr. A poetic journey into the depths of longing and destiny.
sections.easterEgg:
Hidden Details You Missed! ЁЯХ╡я╕ПтАНтЩВя╕П

  • Originally released for the delayed project 'Aakko', this song was so iconic that it was brought back into 'Love Insurance Kompany' to serve a new narrative purpose.
  • The collaboration between Anirudh and Vignesh Shivan has a 100% success rate, and this track is considered the 'soul' of the LIK soundtrack.
  • Cinematographer Ravi Varman used specialized anamorphic lenses for this song's visuals to capture the loneliness of the protagonist in wide, expansive cityscapes.
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

What is Love Insurance Kompany (LIK)?

LIK is a romantic comedy film directed by Vignesh Shivan starring Pradeep Ranganathan and SJ Suryah, with music by Anirudh.

Who is Ananthakr in this song?

Ananthakr is a talented playback singer and musician who frequently collaborates with Anirudh Ravichander on background scores and vocal harmonies.

englishStanzas:
enakenna yaarum illayae unakkadhu thonavillayae

[I have no one for myself, but that doesn't seem to occur to you.]


kadal thandi pogum kadhali kai meeri pogudhey en vidhi nagaraamal nindru pogumey en vazhkayin gadhi

[My lover is traveling across the sea; my fate is slipping out of my hands. The course of my life will come to a standstill.]


paadhi kadhal thandha penne meedhiyum vendum nee pona pinnum endhan manamo irunduthaan pogum

[O girl who gave me half a love, I need the rest too. After you leave, my heart will be shrouded in darkness.]


Kaathiru endru nee solli ponaal adhuve podhum Marandhiru endru nee solli nerndhaal uyire pogum

[If you tell me to 'Wait' before leaving, that's enough. If you happen to say 'Forget me', my life will end.]


bodha needhaaney thallaaduren naaney unn kaamam venaamey unn kaadhal podhumey

[You are my intoxication, and I am stumbling. I don't want your lust; your love is more than enough.]


enakenna yaarum illayae unakkadhu thonavillayae

[I truly have no one else, but you don't seem to realize it.]
